title: Crane Stance
name: 1990s Wuzhou "Three Crane" Liu Bao
description: Crane Stance is a famous 1990s Liu Bao basket from the Wuzhou Tea Factory under their "Three Crane" brand. It was aged by our teachers in Malaysia and some of the proceeds will support a tea culture museum they are building there. The tea was piled, not steamed, making this tea similar to shou puerh in some ways.
